entry.title: Sweet Bunny Praying for You Embroidered Greeting Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.89

Sweet Bunny Praying for You Embroidered Greeting Card let them know you are thinking of them and shows you care. The inside greeting of this card reads: Just wanted to say hi and let you know, I am thinking of you.

What a sweet and comforting design to send to a loved one who needs to know you are thinking of them.  An adorable little bunny praying, surrounded by pretty soft flowers and greenery.

  • Featuring exclusive embroidery artwork
  • Includes envelope and seal
  • Dimensions: 4 1/4" W x  5 1/2” H
    		•

entry.title: Baby Jesus in Manger Holiday Christmas Embroidered Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.89

 This exceptional Christmas card reminds us that Jesus is the reason for the season. It depicts a sweet baby Jesus in His cradle with a pretty and charming little bird chirping on the edge of it. Then the beautiful words from Scripture and a hymn are embroidered… Oh come let us adore Him! What a beautiful way to keep our hearts and minds fixed on our Lord and Savior who came to earth to forgive our sins and make away to our heavenly Father. Thank you, Jesus, for all You have done, all You were doing, and all You are going to do. 

The inside greeting of this card reads: May you be warmed by His love, wrapped in His peace, and filled with His boundless joy.
Merry Christmas!

entry.title: Sweet Kitten Cat Happy Birthday Embroidery Greeting Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.89

A precious little kitten with a pink nose and a blue bow tied round it's neck, sits in the center of an embroidered oval surrounded by multicolor flowers of red, pink, yellow, and green. Send this happy birthday card to someone you know will love it!

The inside greeting of this card reads: May your birthday be special from beginning to end

Featuring exclusive embroidery artwork

Includes envelope for mailing.

Dimensions: 4 1/4" W x 5 1/2 ” H

entry.title: Pink Tea Cup Get Well Embroidered Linen Greeting Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.49

This sweet embroidered linen card features a an endearing little bird sitting on the edge of a teacup, seeming to be chipping out Get Well Wishes. This design also included beautiful embroidered flowers, with polka dots on the teacup.

The inside greeting of this card reads:  A note of encouragement to cheer you up.  Get better soon!

  • Featuring exclusive embroidery artwork
  • Includes envelope and seal 
  • Dimensions: 4 1/4" W x 5 1/2 ” H

Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.89

This is a delightful birthday card featuring an exceptional green frog sitting on a log, in water with cattails floating around him as he is thinking of you on your birthday. You can almost hear him ribbiting and croaking his birthday wishes for you!

The inside greeting of this card reads: May your birthday be special...like you!
Happy Birthday

  • Featuring exclusive embroidery artwork
  • Includes envelope and seal 
  • Dimensions: 4 1/4" W x 5 1/2 ” H

Happy Birthday.

Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards

 What an enjoyable greeting card this would be to receive. A cute little puppy with it's hat tied under his chin with a pretty purple bow and a pink flower on top! This puppy is peeking out of an old-fashioned hat box. Brighten up someone's day and send this card to them for their birthday.

The inside greeting of this card reads: May this day always be a special one to remember. Happy Birthday!

entry.title: Birthday Lady with Pen Embroidered Linen Greeting Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paper Lane
Type: Embroidered Linen Greeting Cards
Price: 5.89

One of our best sellers is this one of a kind, exclusive birthday embroidered card, titled… A birthday note. This card has a vintage feel of old-school world. The beautiful and charming lady is sitting at an antique writing desk penning a note with a quill feathered ink pen. She is wearing a beautiful purple, off the shoulder, dress with a white rose in her hair, on her wrist, on her dress and as a choker around her neck. Anyone would be delighted to receive this charming and exquisite card! 

The inside greeting of this card reads: Wishing you a wonderful and Happy Birthday!

  • Featuring exclusive embroidery artwork
  • Includes envelope and seal 
  • Dimensions: 4 1/4" W x 5 1/2 ” H

    •
